remarks: A multinomial coefficient, in its standard domain, is a positive integer.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
mccl.kb $e |- F/_ k B $.
mccl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
mccl.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( NN0 ^m A ) ) $.
mccl $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ! ` sum_ k e. A ( B ` k ) ) / prod_ k e. A ( ! ` ( B ` k ) ) ) e. NN ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
